title: Advanced Medical Education Program Utilizing Technology-Enhanced Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical terminology and patient care protocol comprehension
context.additional_context: VR/simulation-based medical skill acquisition and assessment in large-scale practice-oriented educational environments.

learning_goals: Perform basic vital sign measurement and documentation with over 90% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Achieve over 85% compliance with patient safety protocols in VR-based scenarios.
Demonstrate collaborative ability at level 4 or higher (5-point scale) through team-based simulation evaluations.
Score over 80 points (out of 100) in knowledge assessments after technology-enhanced simulation training.
Demonstrate comprehensive problem-solving skills reflecting real-world medical situations in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
